## Photograph
### 1968
Photograph, and a copy, of Professor Richard Atkinson on the bridge leading to the tunnel mouth during the first live outside broadcast from the BBC 2 sponsored excavation of Silbury Hill, seen in 'The Silbury Dig', a 'Chronicle' presentation, seen on BBC 2 20th April 1968, Silbury Hill, Avebury, Wiltshire, 1968
